```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r}
library(sagemaker)
library(readr)

temp <- tempfile()
write_csv(sagemaker::abalone, temp, col_names = FALSE)
```

```{r}
upload_file(temp, key = "abalone.csv")
```

```{r}
temp2 <- tempfile()

download_file(temp2, key = "abalone.csv")
read_csv(temp2)
```
